MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML11 postcode areas of Sandilands and Rigside. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:09am. Our engineers have arrived at the Headtown substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:07pm on Thursday, 18 February 2021
